meanings.definition: A type of white blood cell that plays a key role in the immune system.
meanings.sent1: Lymphocytes are important for keeping us healthy.
meanings.sent2: The lymphocytes in our body work hard to protect us from illnesses.
meanings.sent3: When the lymphocytes throw a party, germs are definitely not invited!
meanings.sent4: The lymphocytes are like vigilant soldiers guarding our body against invaders.
meanings.sent5: Imagine tiny superheroes called lymphocytes fighting off the bad guys inside you.

meanings.definition: Cells that help the body fight off infections and diseases.
meanings.sent1: Our immune system relies on lymphocytes to battle harmful germs.
meanings.sent2: During an infection, lymphocytes increase in number to combat the intruders.
meanings.sent3: The lymphocytes are like the body's own personal defense team.
meanings.sent4: In the war against sickness, lymphocytes are the frontline warriors.
meanings.sent5: Picture lymphocytes as tiny warriors armed with shields, protecting your body.
